name: Mumma's Hostel
description:
Mumma's Hostel Surfers Paradise welcomes you to sunny Queensland and its beautiful beaches. We invite all travelers and backpackers to stay with us and enjoy our relaxed hostel and friendly hospitality. Our aim is to provide you with the best budget accommodation on the coast without sacrificing comfort.

We are close to all the action being just a few minutes' walk to Surfers Paradise Beach, shops, restaurants and nightlife and right down the road from main public transport access to explore everything that the Gold Coast has to offer.

The team at Mumma's Hostel Surfers Paradise pride ourselves on offering the perfect environment for meeting like-minded travelers with a fun and friendly atmosphere. 

Here are some of our  inclusions 
 
Free Pizza night on Saturdays
Free unlimited WiFi 24/7 All Rooms
Free Tea and coffee 24/7
Laundry facilities 
No charge for kitchen cutlery/Plates

houseRules.notes:
International passports must be shown upon arrival. 

All Guest Checking in to Mumma's hostel Dorm rooms must have Valid Passport to check in. No Passport No Entry No Exceptions. Mumma's hostel reserves the right to deny any guest who are not compliant with this policy.

Terms and Conditions Surfers Paradise Hostel 
All guests agree that by occupying accommodation at Mumma's Hostel, you shall be personally responsible for all charges incurred for stay. This will include any damages to dormitory or our general areas. It is a condition of a guest's occupancy that the owners of the premises' business will not be liable for damage to or loss of property brought onto the premises by the occupier or their guests. Smoking is NOT permitted in any Rooms. Guests breaking any of the rules in the terms & agreements or guest agreement will be evicted immediately with no refund.

For insurance purposes we have a Passport Only Check in Policy. NO Passport, No Entry, No Exceptions

Dorm rooms are Strictly for 18 -40 years of age. Under 18 years will not be allowed to stay on the property and over 40 years of age must have a private room for check-in.

Cancellation Policy 
To change any details of your booking, you must contact us by phone or email us.  We will do our best to assist you, but cannot guarantee that changes can be made. 

If you cancel your booking on a non-refundable rate you will be charged the full amount and lose your bed space, we reserve the right to re sell the bed. All No Shows will be charged in full and we reserve the right to resell the bed after the first night of the booking. Flexible rates ? cancellation - free up to 24 hours prior to their check in time of 2PM at Mumma's Hostel. Cancellations within the 24hour cancellation policy will incur a cost of 1 night's accommodation fee, All No shows will be charged in full. We highly value your patronage and will endeavour to make your stay at Mumma's Hostel Surfers Paradise an excellent experience. We reserve the right to cancel a booking if and when a guest shows up intoxicated, high on illicit substances, Not able to produce a Valid Passport, Guest acts abusive to staff, Guest makes other guests feel uncomfortable and is not respectful of others staying at Mumm's Hostel.
